parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Executes the given command recursively for each agent that is a member of the given team. For just teams use [[forEachMemberTeam]]. For both teams and agents use [[forEachMember]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> command '''forEachMemberAgent''' team

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> command: [[Code]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> team: [[Team Member]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>(example)</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[agent]], [[agents]], [[createAgent]], [[isAgent]], [[addTeamMember]], [[createTeam]], [[deleteTeam]], [[forEachMemberTeam]], [[removeTeamMember]], [[teamMember]], [[teamName]], [[teams]], [[teamType]], [[forEachMember]]
</value></part></template>
